metadata.title: CVE-2016-6872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in StringUtil::implode in Facebook HHVM before 3.15.0allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
